definition: improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
(posing a question: whether sb, something) can or cannot?/is able to or not
serves you right for doing sth so stupid (Internet slang)
pinyin: bu4 zuo4 si3 jiu4 bu4 hui4 si3

definition: there is no such thing as a free lunch (idiom)
pinyin: tian1 shang4 bu4 hui4 diao4 xian4 bing3

sentences.english: Your shortstop will never forget about practice again.
sentences.chinese: 您的游击手将永远不会忘记的再实践。

sentences.english: At the end of the term, you typically get no cash back.
sentences.chinese: 固定年限到期后，你一般不会得到任何现金返还。

sentences.english: The people who allowed torture have faced no punishment at all.
sentences.chinese: 而那些允许酷刑的人却不会受到任何处罚。

sentences.english: They cant change a light bulb or without making a sketch.
sentences.chinese: 他们连灯泡都不会换，或者至少要先画个草图。

sentences.english: I don't think he will jump his hotel bill.
sentences.chinese: 我认为他不会不付旅馆账单就溜掉的。

sentences.english: When the wind blows , the slender tree bends but never breaks.
sentences.chinese: 起风时，这棵细长的树常弯曲但决不会断。

sentences.english: She never learned how to read a milometer,or any meter.
sentences.chinese: 不管是里程表，还是什么表，她从来就不会看。

sentences.english: Without experiences in mind, he pledged he would never let his own two-year old son face such difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 他发誓不会让自己两岁的儿子生活得那么艰辛。

sentences.english: Pablo must have a sound plan or he would not have tried it.
sentences.chinese: 巴勃罗一定有个行得通的方案，否则他不会这么干。

sentences.english: He that never climbed never fell.
sentences.chinese: 只有不攀登的人才不会跌跤。

sentences.english: Success will not turn my head.
sentences.chinese: 胜利不会让我头脑发昏。

sentences.english: However some grownup parents never figure out how to talk to a child.
sentences.chinese: 然而，许多家长怎么也学不会正确地和孩子交谈。

sentences.english: It will not mean things like levitating objects and reading others minds.
sentences.chinese: 它不会是把物体升空和看穿别人的心思之类的事。

sentences.english: This will help on days that you don’t feel like cooking.
sentences.chinese: 这样每天下来你就不会觉得自己在煮饭了。

sentences.english: It's not a decision you'll regret, even if L.A. winds up losing in a blowout.
sentences.chinese: 即使快船被虐，你也不会后悔这个决定。

definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
haven't/hasn't/doesn't exist/to not have/to not be
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
